message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and I'm happy to offer it to you for $1400000.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my current budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1200000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1300000. This is the best price I can offer at this time.
